objects.text:
• Premium Fragrance for All Genders
• Vibrant & Energizing Scent
• Long-lasting 100ml/3.4 fl. oz
• Elegant Design with Gold Cap

product_details.name: BELLAVITA Fresh Unisex EDT - Vibrant & Energizing Fragrance for All
product_details.description:
• Refreshing unisex eau de toilette suitable for all genders
• Generous 100ml/3.4 fl. oz size for long-lasting use
• Sleek turquoise bottle design with premium gold cap
• Perfect for daily wear and casual occasions
• Modern and clean fragrance profile
• Professional-grade eau de toilette formulation
• Elegant packaging ideal for gifting
• Travel-friendly bottle design
• Premium BELLAVITA brand quality
• Fresh and contemporary scent suitable for any season

banner_details:
This banner features a sleek and vibrant design tailored for a premium unisex perfume product. The background consists of a diagonal, dual-tone gradient in deep teal and aqua, accented with geometric elements and translucent circles to convey a fresh, invigorating atmosphere. The top-left section displays a bold brand name (`heading`), with a highlighted subheading (`subheading`) in bright golden-yellow, followed by a modern, soft typeface for the tagline (`tagline`). A concise bullet list (`description`) outlines product benefits. The pricing (`price`) appears prominently near the bottom in large white font, alongside a strong yellow call-to-action button (`cta`) labeled with direct purchase intent.

**Color Palette**:
- Deep Teal: `#004D40`
- Aqua Blue: `#00BCD4`
- Light Cyan: `#E0F7FA`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Gold-Yellow: `#FFC107`
- Emerald Teal: `#00897B`
product_color: The product image features a vibrant and refreshing color palette that communicates cleanliness and energy. The dominant turquoise blue (#00B3B3) of the bottle exudes freshness and vitality, effectively representing the "Fresh" theme of the fragrance. The metallic gold cap (#D4AF37) adds a luxurious and elegant contrast, elevating the product's aesthetic appeal. The white typography (#FFFFFF) stands out crisply against the turquoise background, ensuring high readability and a clean design. The blending of aqua tones is smooth with soft reflections, drawing focus while maintaining harmony. For an advertisement banner, complementary colors like soft beige (#F5F5DC) or navy blue (#003366) can be used.
